website_summaries.verdict: This robe is a comfortable and soft choice for anyone looking to stay warm all winter, with the length hitting below one’s knees.
pros: Belted robe that boasts softness and warmth
Possesses 2 convenient pockets and belt loops at different heights to choose where to tie robe closed
Length of robe and arms are both pleasing
cons: Cut is meant to be roomier, which some may find more masculine

customer_reviews.title: nice warm soft economical robe
customer_reviews.text: Nice robe, nothing fancy but soft and very warm with big pockets. It has two belt loops at different heights so you can choose. I am 5'4" size 8 women's, and got a S/M in this robe. It fits well, plenty big, but the sleeves are kind of short, which is OK but some may not like. It's basically like one of those soft throw blankets you see at discount stores, made into a bathrobe. So not terribly elegant but fine for everyday use. It is VERY warm, sometimes I get too hot in it, and definitely won't be using it in the warmer parts of the year.
customer_reviews.author: L. J.

customer_reviews.title: I loved my last one so much that I wore it ...
customer_reviews.text: I decided to spoil myself a little but with a soft and warm robe. I loved my last one so much that I wore it out with thousands of washes. I selected the color red this time because I wanted a darker color and who doesn't love bright cheerful colors?! It fits as I expected it to and I've managed to stay warm despite taking the dog out in it every am and every night after getting ready for bed or just waking up. I'm trying to decide what my next color will be. Would love to have one of each and for the price, it's possible.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Good Robe
customer_reviews.text: I like this robe very much. Because of other reviewers saying that the robe ran large, I bought the S/M, when I normally would have purchased a large to insure a roomy and luxurious fit. The reviewers were right....this robe seems larger than small/medium, and it fits perfectly. The only thing I would change are side pockets (inner) instead of patch pockets, and the belt loops made smaller. The blue color is deep and gorgeous and the acrylic pile is ultra soft. The quality so far seems good, but it has not yet been washed. It is not quite so long on me as shown on the model, and I am 5'5". Hopes this helps other potential purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Koval

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very big. The fleece sheds very much. Everything you wear under it gets little red lint balls all over it. Also they get all over the floor, rug and everything else. Little disappointed with that.
customer_reviews.author: deb keating

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this robe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this robe! GREAT for the low price (~$27), it's rich color, lush looking and very soft. Not to heavy either (I have another fleece robe that weighs about 3 times as much as this one. Very happy with it, and might buy another.
customer_reviews.author: rmcmmc7

customer_reviews.title: So soft and warm, you'll want to live in it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this robe for my college-aged daughter. She loves it. Says it is the softest thing she owns and she would live in it if she could; she did in fact wear it exclusively for nearly 3 days! The robe fits perfectly. She is petite (5'2") and so the robe goes to her ankles. On a woman of average height, it would hit mid-calf. The colors are fast and do not run. The robe is a very luxurious navy blue, warm, cuddly, and very comfortable. She is hard to please and this was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry GassawayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just what my wife wanted...
customer_reviews.text: Robe has a nice fit to it..roomy without being too much & warm without being too heavy. The only (very minor) issue was the belt...it was attached to the robe itself. My wife snipped it to detach and now, it's fine. Seems well made and my wife was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too large
customer_reviews.text: If you need a small order another brand. This was supposed to be a small to medium but fit me as an extra large. The shoulder seam went very low and I could almost wrap it around me twice; I am a size 8 so if you are small order another robe. I was sorry it did not fit as it was a nice looking and feeling robe.
customer_reviews.author: VCLee

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric - pink more intense than the photo.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very soft and luxurious. It is a bit thinner than I would have preferred. But I returned it because of the color. I ordered the light pink and it was much more intense than in the photo. It is a pretty color, so if you like bright things, you'll love it! It was just a bit to much to me. It was a bit close to pepto-bismal, which I don't mean as a criticism. Just so you know the pink is not 'light pink'. It is definitely PINK.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Jokie

customer_reviews.title: True Red
customer_reviews.text: I like this product alot. I gave this as a gift to my mom and she has put it to use. She uses it every morning and it fits very well. I am rating this with a 4 instead of a 5 because of how the material has been worn out. I received a robe very similar to this one and mine looks pretty good, this one after 3 years looks worn down [maybe due to the washes]
customer_reviews.author: Edna Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A nice snuggle robe in syle
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cozy robe. I got a L/XL and it IS large on me, but that's fine and cozy! (I wear size 10/12, 33" inseam). It was NOT as thick as I wanted or expected. It's about the same thinness as the robes you find at all retailers. I went online to get something thicker. NO luck yet! But it is so nice I will keep it. I got the black, which is great. Hope it holds up to washing! I also like how it is designed to fit a woman- eg, shoulders:hip ratio!
customer_reviews.author: vivzs

customer_reviews.title: Feels like nice velour against your skin
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, lightweight warm robe. Feels like nice velour against your skin. I am 5'1' and ordered an extra large because I wanted it big and longer. It falls just slightly above my ankles. Love the robe, the color of red and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lover

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: A small / medium was ordered and the label said as such, but this size might have fit a sumo wrestler, not a sm / med lady!
customer_reviews.author: BILL B.

customer_reviews.title: wrap yourself in softness.
customer_reviews.text: this is a super soft, generously made robe! I wear a size 14 and it completely wraps over the front of me on both sides.. there is a nice inside tie to keep it in place and is mid-calf in length as the picture shows. I bought the navy blue as I was wanting a darker color to keep from looking dirty at the sleeves as they are also nice a long. Not disappointed and have loved lounging in it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret I. O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Quality was ok and don't know about the size. ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality was ok and don't know about the size. Unfortunately, the color was much deeper and more intense than illustration or what I expected of "light pink" -- medium rose or light magenta would be closer to the mark. It was purchased for a gift but I returned it without taking it out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: smb

customer_reviews.title: So soft and warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice robe. The belt is sewn on so you don't have to worry about losing it in the wash. I got the lrg/x lrg and it very roomy w/out being to big. I love how soft it is. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is there are a couple slight sewing imperfections but nothing that would make me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine 85

customer_reviews.title: Soft, lightweight and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I had one just like it and my girlfriend kept stealing it, even though it wrapped around her several times and she had to roll the sleeves way up- so i bought her one and now she can't wait to get home and put it on. Very soft, lightweight but also very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Slifer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft but a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this robe. It's nice and soft and I like the navy blue color. The only complaint would be that it's a bit larger than I'd like. I ordered a medium and probably would be happier with a small. I'm 5'3" 130lbs. The medium is fine though and still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L. Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Pepto Bisrobe
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as light pink, but is actually the color of Pepto Bismol. There are two loops for the belt and looks ridiculous on. Very disappointed and paid way too much for this cheesy item. Just BEWARE, it's not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Shea

customer_reviews.title: light weight but very warm
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this type of robe in fleece. It is light weight but very warm. I live in snow country so warm is important. washes well also .
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality was very disappointing. Top half of the robe was extra large the rest was medium and OK. The sewing especially in the attached pocket looked like a inexperience child made it. The thickness of the 100% polyester was very thin. I am comparing to a robe I have had for 15 years. . . no comparison. But I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Biernbaum

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this moose bathrobe. Very bright red! The size runs a little large, but it is better that way. Very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen I

customer_reviews.title: Plush
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my mom for Christmas, and it was perfectly soft and plush. My mom is one of those people who is always cold, and she was all smiles when she put it on -- she says it's incredibly warm and insulates well, even against the chill of the wind when she wanders outside for a bit. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yahtzee

customer_reviews.title: Very fluffy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas a year ago and she loves it. It's still so plush a fluffy and keeps her warm no matter how cold it is.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The robe looks nice, fit is great
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter who's in her first year living in a dorm. The robe looks nice, fit is great, longer length will keep her warmer. She is very happy with the feel. Pulled on it a bit & did not notice shedding. Have not washed it yet but I'm optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Harper

customer_reviews.title: It’s big and super soft and baby loves it too
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a robe person but I bought this in preparation for delivering my first child. I didn’t use it at al at the hospital but live in it now that I’m home. It’s big and super soft and baby loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty, and cozy
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty, and cozy, but larger than expected. Will be returning for credit mainly because the color is not light pink as advertised....it is more of a neon bright pink. Not hot pink....just neon as best I can describe it.
customer_reviews.author: DeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until I washed it for the first time and the seaming on the belt unraveled. It was incredibly soft but I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It feels great. I got a little excited and washed and ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels great. I got a little excited and washed and realized the L/XL was a little big I probably could have gone a size down. It feels awesome I washed it no signs of falling apart or threads coming off. Really soft!
customer_reviews.author: Kwelch

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my wife and she was more them happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife and she was more them happy with it. The fit was perfect and she absolutely loves how it feels. She put it on right away and I expect she will be wearing it most of the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: A large would probably have been the best fit. Nice color and quality though
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XX large as I would rather have a robe be too big than too small. It was HUGE! A large would probably have been the best fit. Nice color and quality though.
customer_reviews.author: peggysou

customer_reviews.title: Great robe but the sizing is WAY off
customer_reviews.text: Great robe but the sizing is WAY off. I wear a 2x-3x and so ordered a xl/2x thinking that would be ok. I don't mind the robe being somewhat large, but this one was big enough for two (2) of me - almost. I returned this and have ordered the Large/XL hoping that will fit better. Otherwise, great robe.
customer_reviews.author: xyz

customer_reviews.title: the loops for the belt stuck out on the sides like a huge set of ears
customer_reviews.text: it was warm but way too large and bulky. the loops for the belt stuck out on the sides like a huge set of ears. not attractive.
customer_reviews.author: positive girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it to pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest robe I've ever had. Love it to pieces. I was intrigued about the 2 loops for the belt but have found it to be perfect usually a belt sits to low for me, now its just right.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great robe for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and I like the interior and exterior ties. The pockets are convenient and the robe washes well.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: warm and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: this robe is exacally what I wanted right weight right size and right price
customer_reviews.author: kelly huffman

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE.... Seams are glued Not stitched!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!!! The seams are GLUED!!!!!! They have already begun to come apart!!! The seams are not stitched and now there is a two inch hole in the right shoulder. I'm SO disappointed and I feel used!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Souljah Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gf and she absolutely loved it and wears it over her previous robe she had.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Farris

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This robe is great!! Soft warm, cozy! Good length too.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Robe
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a Xmas present she liked it so much I ordered another one
customer_reviews.author: Billie F.

customer_reviews.title: What a mess! I washed & dried robe and ...
customer_reviews.text: What a mess! I washed & dried robe and when I opened the dryer door I had a big messy surprise waiting for me. As much as it shed I'm surprised there was any robe left at all. I am returning this for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Blesssed beyond measure

customer_reviews.title: Small/medium is more like a large
customer_reviews.text: This robe is way to large and it's a s/m
customer_reviews.author: Mary Allen

customer_reviews.title: The best robe!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft robe, and when washing, not much excess lint comes off. I got the black XL-XXL, I am a 5'11" gal but of normal weight and I love the extra room and length to my mid-shin. Also, according to other reviews, it seems I was lucky to have received the belt with it! Hope these problems get solved! :o
customer_reviews.author: Blue lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fleece bathrobe! It's so soft and warm, I wear it a lot. The size runs a bit large, but I don't mind - that just leaves room for wintertime layering. The robe is well-made, and the color is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: EABaldwin

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: It was much larger than I expected and the arm holes were enormous! I returned it. Color and weight of fleece was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Olson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and cozy but had to exchange the size to a smaller one for an accurate fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ro S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it. Very soft, perfect fit! Quality seems great. She has had this since Christmas and it still looks like she took it out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Fleece Robe
customer_reviews.text: It is a little large, but that is OK 'cause it keeps me nice and warm. It is real soft to the touch but a bit bright in color.
customer_reviews.author: diana mann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The robe is a good fit. Plenty long and plenty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: A little large but it's soft and has a good length. Washed it and it shed a little
customer_reviews.text: A little large but it's soft and has a good length. Washed it and it shed a little. But I'm glad I got it. It works for me
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great robe.
customer_reviews.text: Softest fleece I've ever owned. Fit is perfect and so is color (purple). I was looking at Land's End robes, couldn't find one I liked and bought this instead for 1/2 the price. Great quality. I would definitely purchase other items from Leveret.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stetter

customer_reviews.title: NICE VALUE AND SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is wonderful and soft and cozy! However, the sleeves are LONG and the belt is kind of small/thin. So, I cut off the sleeves and now it's perfect! (I have a sewing machine)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subjective here but light pink a little bit "peptobizmo" like according to my wife
customer_reviews.text: Subjective here but light pink a little bit "peptobizmo" like according to my wife. I was Ok with it. But would be better if the light pink was lighter more pale in color. Quality of materials and fit all good.
customer_reviews.author: drfz123

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES this robe. It is very comfortable and warm. It's exactly what she wanted. Delivery was quick and the robe was as described. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cade Brenchley

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and I really like it. It is so soft even after many washings and so cozy.
customer_reviews.author: pathat

customer_reviews.title: Super soft.
customer_reviews.text: This robe is super soft and fluffy. It's runs big- wish I gone with a medium size but I jest wear it early in the morning when there is a chill- so it works. This is the only reason why I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nimruse

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Slightly large but super soft and comfortable. Excellent buy for the price. It's very cozy. Only reason for not giving it 5 stars was it's a little too roomy, but I'm still going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Lovely robe.
customer_reviews.text: So soft and warm and a good long length robe. The color is a lovely blue. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: smiller

customer_reviews.title: yummy!
customer_reviews.text: As thousands have said before me, this is incredibly SOFT and WARM,
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kotler

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this robe I gave her for Christmas. It's large on her which I figured it would be. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I wish it would come in an x-small or even just small and not s/m combined. It's very silky soft and she'll enjoy it with lots of grow room. She wanted a LONG robe and all of the kids sizes are NOT long enough.
customer_reviews.author: James & Christina De Leo

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed, amazon multiple people have posted this problem
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and my wife loves it. But no belt. You can see it on the picture, but not there. A little disappointed, amazon multiple people have posted this problem. How come you haven't pulled the product yet?
customer_reviews.author: Psypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this robe! It is very soft and washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Adirondack city slicker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its very nice material and a great price. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft. Nice, Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. She says it is soft and warm and feels like a warm blanket wrapped around her.
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's larger than I expected but it is so soft and comfy!! Best robe I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Hendy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy! Keeps me warm and covered up when needed :)
customer_reviews.author: Jaylen

customer_reviews.title: The search is still on for the perfect robe!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and color is beautiful. Super humongous and sleeves were 10 inches longer than my arms. I don't think going down a size would help enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this new robe! The color is rich and the material is soft. This robe was ordered for a guest who will be renting my home this summer. I'm sure she'll appreciate how nice and warm this robe is.
customer_reviews.author: endlessrain

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: This robe runs a bit large, but I expected that based on the sizing. It is extremely soft and very comfortable. I was happy to find a navy robe, it's not a color I have found in stores. I expect to get a lot of use out of this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Warm soft robe
customer_reviews.text: Really warm soft robe Bought oversized Washes well keeps shape Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as a gift for my wife and loves it
customer_reviews.author: ImDealingWith

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The color in the ad looks more burgandy, which I wanted, however, as coffee expresses, it is brown. BUT it is a reddish brown and sooooo soft, with plenty of room to snuggle in. I am a 2 to 3X and it runs somewhat large. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia C. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great robe
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and lightweight. The pink is bright pastel pink. Length is perfect at mid-calf. Sleeves are long but stay rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Parks

customer_reviews.title: Nice robe.
customer_reviews.text: Nice robe.. soft and I like it.. I do think it's a little big, but for a robe it doesn't matter too much. And, I am a small person... 5'2" 115lbs. It's warm which is a plus. SO.. I would overall recommend this robe!
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Moms loved it, super soft, fit to size, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Moms loved it, super soft, fit to size, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Paric

customer_reviews.title: Buy one for yourself and others!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone I care a lot about. She loved the color, the fit and the plush feeling of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: This robe was excellent.. fits great, and so nice and soft and cuddly..
customer_reviews.author: B. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great robe but runs much larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this robe but it's way too big...I ordered an XL because I like things very loose fitting and that way I can wear this over clothes if I want to. It's soft and fluffy, comes with a belt and feels great on. The only problem is the XL is more like an XXXL. Other than that, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cozy robe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the soft pink color and super soft fleece! My only complaint is that it sheds and after washing it pilled up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkyRobin

customer_reviews.title: My step mom said the robe was nice. My only negative feedback is with delivery and ...
customer_reviews.text: My step mom said the robe was nice . My only negative feedback is with delivery and that was on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this robe as a Christmas gift for my mom - she absolutely loved it. It is soft and warm and her favorite color :) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: the Mindful Wanderers

customer_reviews.title: ... who is a very picky person but she absolutely loved it! It was a little to big for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my mom who is a very picky person but she absolutely loved it! It was a little to big for her but other than that she loved how soft it was.
customer_reviews.author: brooklynn morris

customer_reviews.title: WANT A REALLY NICE ROBE...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this robe. Good quality fabric, nicely made, good delivery time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane St John

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! I will be sending it back as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I will be sending it back as I just received it today. One of the cuffs is ripped and sewn with purple thread. The robe is black! The other cuff if not sewn correctly either. I will attach pictures if needed.
customer_reviews.author: John haman

customer_reviews.title: The material is nice and soft though
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend...and it fits way too big; I had to return it. The material is nice and soft though.
customer_reviews.author: P. Poon

customer_reviews.title: Fleece Robe
customer_reviews.text: This was just as I expected and I would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is awesome! Fabric is thick and plush. Holds up well after laundering. Will probably purchase more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife !  Great Gift. !
customer_reviews.text: The robe fit my wife perfect. The only complaint iis that the belt could be a little longer. But it is very warm and long. She is 5'7" & large chested. No complaints, besides the belt length, but it does work out fine. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Craig Middents

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: She loved it. Has belt and she loves that it had pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LUXURY at its finest!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe. It is super soft, warm and luxurious. Definitely recommend this as a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this robe! Very soft and keeps me warm during those cold nights. I definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Terrific robe
customer_reviews.text: So soft and warm, perfect fit, terrific color, washes great w no shrinkage or color bleeding
customer_reviews.author: corinne sbaratta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a loved one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it. Very soft and hangs right below the knees. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: So soft and warm. Easy to do things in around the house - sleeves don't get in the way. Pockets!
customer_reviews.author: JMV

customer_reviews.title: two problems
customer_reviews.text: Major scissor cut on the sleeve of the robe where somebody tried to trim a thread and cut the material. Also no sash was included with the robe.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable robe
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my wife who loves it and appreciates how soft it is.
customer_reviews.author: William Beckman

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty skirt but the color is faded in spots leaving ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty skirt but the color is faded in spots leaving it a yellowish color in those spots. Very disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice robe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves it! Very plush and warm.
